Here is a version that doesn't use that much code: (its a bit complicated tho)

First: -> identify where the task is created if its created at a contact level -> take a contact based workflow
created at a company level-> Company based etc.

then you take last modified date as a trigger

everytime it triggers -> copy the record id of the most recently created task and match it with the last record id of the last task if it doesnt match -> you have the action
(put filters in before so only when your application creates the task then the right branch gets taken)

then create an owner property to set before sending the notification and then create the notification with the "send to exisiting owner" property and send it to the desired person.

if you need help just DM me :slightly_smiling_face:
